WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm closing this, if this is still present in current version open a new issue.
WorkItem.Description: I am using the current debug/beta version since the stable build doesn't support fury. When I go to select new gems, enchants, reforging, and even gear I get immense lag and it takes anywhere from 30-60 seconds for anything to change. My Everest says rawr is using about 90% of my 6-core cpu when the above lag happens. Is this normal? Am I just an idiot? Thanks.

Comments.Message: I'm not sure if it's normal, but it might have something to do with it being a debug build. I've already talked with Jothay and any further preview versions will be release builds.
I've never used a debug build, but being a fury warrior I was forced to. So I have no idea if the lag is normal or not, which is why I posted here.
To do any form of checking on this, I would need your character file.

I am having a similar issue but not just with one character, with all my characters I try to transfer via rawr add on. I thought that maybe I was using an outdated version of the add on so I updated it and its still lagging really bad ad using all my CPU resources.
To clarify: I'm lagging no matter what character I am spreadsheeting with. I have tried a fury warrior, prot warrior, and resto shaman. All of them proved to lag my cpu to 99%.
